alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 1:08PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds up to 45 mph with blizzard conditions until 8 PM. Winds and snow decreasing after 8 PM, but areas of blowing snow still expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Mellette County and Todd County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
